name: Unfair Arena
description:
Welcome to the Unfair Arena, The Champion has been undefeated for far too long and is looking for a challenger that can defeat him. You and a friend can either play as the Champion, a ruthless brute or the Challenger, a small but perseverant man. The first to defeat the Champion as the Challenger wins, if you can't, you exchange roles !

requirements:

2 players

2 xbox controllers

Credits:

Lili Csonka - art / concept / design

Camille Gangneux - art / animation

Keryann Malacchina - Prog / Game Design / Sound

Niels Tiercelin - Prog / Game Design
